verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H1471><s%> were clean <S%H8552><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> you twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H582><s%> out of the people, <S%H5971><s%> out of every tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%>

And command <S%H6680><s%> you them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H5375><s%> you hence <S%H2088><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> out of the place where the priests' <S%H3548><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> stood <S%H4673><s%> firm, <S%H3559><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and you shall carry <S%H5674><s%> them over <S%H5674><s%> with you, and leave <S%H5117><s%> them in the lodging <S%H4411><s%> place, where <S%H834><s%> you shall lodge <S%H3885><s%> this night. <S%H3915><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out of every tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man: <S%H376><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and take <S%H7311><s%> you up every man <S%H376><s%> of you a stone <S%H68><s%> on his shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

That this <S%H2063><s%> may be a sign <S%H226><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you, that when <S%H3588><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> their fathers in time <S%H4279><s%> to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> mean you by these <S%H428><s%> stones? <S%H68><s%>

Then you shall answer <S%H559><s%> them, That the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut <S%H3772><s%> off before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> when it passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut <S%H3772><s%> off: and these <S%H428><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> shall be for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> as Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> up twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and carried <S%H5674><s%> them over <S%H5674><s%> with them to the place where <S%H413><s%> they lodged, <S%H4411><s%> and laid <S%H3240><s%> them down there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> set <S%H6965><s%> up twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the place where the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> stood: <S%H4673><s%> and they are there <S%H8033><s%> to this <S%H2063><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

For the priests <S%H3548><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> was finished <S%H8552><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua: <S%H3091><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> hurried <S%H4116><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> over. <S%H5674><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> were clean <S%H8552><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> that the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2571><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them:

About forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> prepared <S%H2502><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> to the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

On that day <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> magnified <S%H1431><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they feared <S%H3372><s%> him, as they feared <S%H3372><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life. <S%H2416><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> that they come <S%H5927><s%> up out of Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore commanded <S%H6680><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Come <S%H5927><s%> you up out of Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> were come <S%H5927><s%> up out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the priests' <S%H3548><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> were lifted <S%H5423><s%> up to the dry <S%H2724><s%> land, that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to their place, <S%H4725><s%> and flowed <S%H3212><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his banks, <S%H1415><s%> as they did before. <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up out of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> in the east <S%H4217><s%> border <S%H7097><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And those <S%H428><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they took <S%H3947><s%> out of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> did Joshua <S%H3091><s%> pitch <S%H6965><s%> in Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>

And he spoke <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When <S%H834><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> shall ask <S%H7592><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> in time <S%H4279><s%> to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> mean these <S%H428><s%> stones? <S%H68><s%>

Then you shall let your children <S%H1121><s%> know, <S%H3045><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> dried <S%H3001><s%> up the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, until <S%H5704><s%> you were passed <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he dried <S%H3001><s%> up from before <S%H6440><s%> us, until <S%H5704><s%> we were gone <S%H5674><s%> over: <S%H5674><s%>

That all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> might know <S%H3045><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that it is mighty: <S%H2389><s%> that you might fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for ever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
